hero.title: Discover How AI Can Grow Your Business
hero.subtitle: In 90 seconds, Maverick Lens shows exactly where AI can create real value in your business — ranked by ROI and time-to-value.
hero.text1: Turn your company’s online presence into a clear, ROI-driven AI action plan.

form.title: Generate Your AI Report
form.subtitle: Enter your company information to get started
form.error: Failed to generate report. Please try again.

features.title: Why Maverick Lens?
features.subtitle: Get actionable AI strategy insights in minutes, not months

section1.title: 8 Strategic Sections
section1.description: Comprehensive analysis covering executive summary, competitive landscape, ROI-ranked use cases, and more.

section2.title: < 90 s Report Generation
section2.description: Fast, automated research powered by AI to deliver insights at the speed of business.

section3.title: 5 ROI-Ranked AI Use Cases
section3.description: Prioritized opportunities with quantified benefits, costs, and payback periods.

section4.title: Seamless Integration
section4.description: Connects instantly with your public website or company profile — no data upload required.

section5.title: Executive Analysis in Minutes
section5.description: Generates a concise, board-ready intelligence report with ROI, feasibility, and a 90-day action plan.

section6.title: Quantified Impact
section6.description: Each use case includes projected benefit, cost, payback, and confidence level — all visualized.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get your comprehensive AI opportunity report in three simple steps

step1.title: Enter Company Details
step1.description: Provide your company name and website URL. We'll use this to gather public information.

step2.title: AI Analysis
step2.description: Our multi-agent AI system researches your company and analyzes opportunities using advanced LLM technology.

step3.title: Get Your Report
step3.description: Receive a comprehensive report with AI opportunities, ROI projections, competitive analysis, and actionable insights.

cta.title: Let's Design Your AI Roadmap Together
cta.subtitle: Your 90-second report is just the beginning.
cta.text1: Work with our strategy team to:
cta.listitem3: Launch your first AI use case within 90 days

problem.title: Business Problem
problem.text1: AI is everywhere — but for most businesses, it's still just talk.
problem.text2: Months of "AI readiness" meetings, endless PowerPoints, zero measurable return.
problem.text3: By the time the recommendations arrive, the market has already moved.
problem.text4: You don’t need another workshop. You need clarity, speed, and direction - grounded in your actual business reality.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.text2: Using advanced AI, it analyzes your company's online footprint, benchmarks your competitors, and pinpoints the initiatives that will deliver the fastest ROI.
solution.text3: You'll get a concise, executive-ready AI Opportunity Brief — highlighting your top five AI use cases with ROI projections, feasibility insights, and a practical 90-day action plan.
solution.text4: The result? Clear priorities. Tangible value.

section1.title: Clarity in Minutes
section1.description: Skip the buzzwords — get insight you can act on right away.

section2.title: Quantified ROI
section2.description: Every recommendation includes projected cost, benefit, and payback.

section3.title: Built for Decision-Makers
section3.description: Designed for CEOs, CFOs, and leadership teams who want results — not theory.

section4.title: Zero Setup
section4.description: No integrations. No uploads. Just your website, and we handle the rest.

whatsInsideReport.title: What's Inside Your Report

item2.title: Quantified Impact
item2.description: benefit, cost, payback, and confidence level

item3.title: 90-Day Action Plan
item3.description: your roadmap from idea to implementation

item4.title: Competitive Benchmarking
item4.description: see how you compare within your industry

whatsInsideReport.closing: No guesswork. No jargon. Just actionable, data-backed insight.
